name: Deathbringer II
description: Eliminate 50 enemies in Classic Mode to complete the Deathbringer II mission.

rewards.title: Deathbringer II
rewards.extra: Unlock this title after eliminating 50 enemies in Classic Mode, showcasing your killer instinct.

tipsTricks.heading: Target High-Traffic Areas
tipsTricks.description: Focus on landing in popular hotspots where a large number of enemies are likely to appear, such as Bootcamp, Military Base, or Pochinki.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Long-Range Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Utilize weapons with good accuracy and range like the M416 or Kar98K for eliminating enemies from a distance.

tipsTricks.heading: Stick to the Safe Zone
tipsTricks.description: Stay within the safe zone to avoid unnecessary damage, but donâ€™t be afraid to challenge enemies in high-traffic zones.

tipsTricks.heading: Maximize Elimination Opportunities
tipsTricks.description: Consider aggressive strategies to maximize eliminations. Position yourself in areas with limited exits to trap enemies.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 50 Enemies
requirements.description: You need to eliminate 50 enemies across multiple Classic Mode matches to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Classic Mode Only
requirements.description: This mission can only be completed in Classic Mode, so ensure you're playing in the correct mode.

name: Deathbringer I
description: Eliminate 10 enemies in Classic Mode to complete the Deathbringer I mission.

rewards.title: Deathbringer I
rewards.extra: Unlock this title after eliminating 10 enemies in Classic Mode, marking your early steps towards becoming a true predator.

tipsTricks.heading: Start with Solo or Duo Matches
tipsTricks.description: Solo or duo matches are ideal for completing this mission as they offer more chances for direct combat and eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Stealthy Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Sneak up on your enemies to catch them off guard for easier headshots and quicker eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Assault Rifles or SMGs
tipsTricks.description: Assault rifles like the M416 or SMGs are great for eliminating enemies quickly with their rapid fire rates.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Hotspots
tipsTricks.description: Landing in high-traffic areas like Bootcamp, Military Base, or Pochinki can increase your chances of encountering enemies early in the match.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies
requirements.description: You need to eliminate 10 enemies in Classic Mode to complete this mission.

requirements.heading: Classic Mode Only
requirements.description: This mission can only be completed in Classic Mode, so make sure you are playing in the correct mode.

name: Pistol Mastery V
description: Eliminate 200 enemies using pistols in Classic Mode to complete the Pistol Mastery V mission. Showcase your skill with sidearms in PUBG Mobile.

rewards.title: Pistol Mastery V
rewards.extra: Earn a special badge and title after eliminating 200 enemies with a pistol, proving you're a master of sidearms.

tipsTricks.heading: Use P1911 or R1895 Pistols
tipsTricks.description: The P1911 and R1895 offer high damage output with great accuracy. Focus on using them for quicker eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: Pistols can be powerful when you aim for the head. Headshots will increase your elimination speed, especially in close-range encounters.

tipsTricks.heading: Try Solo Mode for Easier Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: If you're struggling to eliminate 200 enemies, try playing solo mode where you're more likely to encounter enemies on your own, allowing for easier eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Unranked to Protect Your Rating
tipsTricks.description: If you're worried about your rating or just want to focus on getting pistol kills without the pressure of ranked matches, try playing in unranked mode. This will allow you to complete the mission without affecting your rank.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 200 Enemies with Pistol
requirements.description: You need to eliminate 200 enemies using pistols in Classic Mode to complete the mission.

requirements.heading: Classic Mode Only
requirements.description: Ensure that you're playing in Classic Mode, as this mission is exclusive to that mode.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Close-Range Combat
tipsTricks.description: Pistols excel in close-range combat. Focus on engaging enemies in tight spaces or while inside buildings where you have an advantage.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the P1911 or R1895 Pistols
tipsTricks.description: P1911 and R1895 pistols are reliable for this mission. They deal significant damage and have good accuracy, making them ideal for eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice Headshots
tipsTricks.description: Aim for headshots with pistols for faster kills. Practice in training mode to improve your aim and increase your chances of landing a headshot.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Solo Mode
tipsTricks.description: Solo mode is ideal for this mission, as you're more likely to encounter enemies one-on-one, giving you an opportunity to use pistols effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Unranked to Protect Your Rating
tipsTricks.description: To avoid losing rank points while completing this mission, consider playing unranked mode. This lets you focus on pistol eliminations without the pressure of ranked matches.

tipsTricks.description: P1911 and R1895 are reliable pistols, dealing heavy damage per shot. Use them for their high damage output and accuracy.

tipsTricks.description: Aim for headshots with pistols to quickly eliminate enemies. Practice your aim in training mode to improve your precision.

tipsTricks.description: Solo mode gives you more control over encounters, allowing you to use pistols in a controlled environment with fewer distractions.

tipsTricks.description: Play unranked mode to complete this mission without risking your rank. This mode lets you focus on pistols without affecting your rating.

name: Melee Mastery V
description: Eliminate 200 enemies using melee weapons to complete the Melee Mastery V mission. Show your dominance in close-quarters combat!

rewards.title: Melee Mastery V
rewards.extra: Unlock a special title and bragging rights for eliminating 200 enemies using melee weapons.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Melee Weapons in Close Quarters
tipsTricks.description: Melee weapons are best used in close-quarters combat. Focus on ambushing enemies in tight spaces such as buildings and narrow corridors.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose the Right Melee Weapon
tipsTricks.description: The crowbar and machete are some of the best melee weapons for quick kills. Experiment with different melee options to find your favorite.

tipsTricks.heading: Avoid Ranged Combat
tipsTricks.description: Melee weapons are ineffective at long range. Close the distance between you and your enemy for a successful elimination.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Smaller Maps for Easier Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Smaller maps such as Vikendi and Sanhok offer more opportunities for close-range combat, making them ideal for melee eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Unranked Mode for Low-Stress Gameplay
tipsTricks.description: Play in unranked mode to focus on completing the mission without the pressure of ranked matches.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 200 Enemies with Melee Weapons

tipsTricks.heading: Pick the Right Melee Weapon
tipsTricks.description: The crowbar, pan, and machete are all great choices for melee combat. These weapons have high damage and are easy to use.

tipsTricks.heading: Look for Close-Range Encounters
tipsTricks.description: Melee weapons are best in tight spaces, so fight in buildings, forests, or narrow alleys where you can easily get close to enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Smaller Maps
tipsTricks.description: Smaller maps like Sanhok and Vikendi are perfect for melee eliminations because they offer more close-range combat opportunities.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Stealth to Get Close
tipsTricks.description: Approach enemies silently and land the first blow. Stealthy attacks will help you get close without being noticed.

name: SMG Mastery V
description: Eliminate 2000 enemies using SMG weapons to complete the SMG Mastery V mission. Prove you're the master of rapid-fire combat!

rewards.title: SMG Master
rewards.extra: Earn the title 'SMG Master' and a special reward for eliminating 2000 enemies with SMGs.

tipsTricks.heading: Use High-RoF SMGs
tipsTricks.description: SMGs like the UMP45, Vector, and Tommy Gun have high rates of fire, making them ideal for eliminating enemies quickly in close-to-mid range.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Mobile and Aggressive
tipsTricks.description: Use your SMG's mobility to stay aggressive in fights. Move fast and keep pressure on enemies in close-range combat.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Close Quarters Combat
tipsTricks.description: SMGs excel in close-range combat, so look for opportunities to fight indoors or in tight spaces like buildings or forests.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: SMGs are effective at spraying bullets, but landing headshots will increase your elimination speed and efficiency.

tipsTricks.heading: Pick the Right SMG
tipsTricks.description: Choose the right SMG based on your playstyle. The Vector offers fast firing but low damage, while the UMP45 has better range and damage.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Unranked to Protect Your Rating
tipsTricks.description: If you're concerned about your rank or rating, play in Unranked Mode to complete this mission. Eliminations in Unranked do not affect your rating, allowing you to practice without consequences.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 2000 Enemies with SMGs
requirements.description: Complete the mission by eliminating 2000 enemies using SMG weapons like UMP45, Vector, or Tommy Gun.

requirements.heading: Play in Classic Mode or Unranked Mode
requirements.description: You must complete this mission in Classic Mode or Unranked Mode to count the eliminations.

name: SMG Mastery IV
description: Eliminate 500 enemies using SMGs to complete the SMG Mastery IV mission. Show off your skills with rapid-fire weapons!

rewards.title: SMG Specialist
rewards.extra: Earn the title 'SMG Specialist' and an exclusive reward for eliminating 500 enemies with SMGs.

tipsTricks.heading: Utilize High-Rate of Fire SMGs
tipsTricks.description: SMGs like the Vector, UMP45, and Tommy Gun have great fire rates and are perfect for close-to-mid-range combat. Use them to quickly eliminate enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Keep Moving for Advantage
tipsTricks.description: Stay aggressive and keep moving to maintain an upper hand. SMGs excel when you're up close and moving, so engage enemies in tight spaces.

tipsTricks.heading: Use SMGs in Buildings or Close-Quarter Combat
tipsTricks.description: SMGs are ideal for indoor or close-range combat. Look for opportunities to engage in areas like buildings, warehouses, or close-quarter areas.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head
tipsTricks.description: Make every shot count by aiming for the head, especially in close-range encounters. SMGs may have rapid fire, but headshots make the difference in securing eliminations faster.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose the Right SMG for Your Playstyle
tipsTricks.description: Pick your SMG based on your preferences. The Vector has a great fire rate, while the UMP45 offers better damage. The Tommy Gun provides a balanced approach with great versatility.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Unranked for Rating Protection
tipsTricks.description: To protect your ranking and ratings, play in Unranked Mode while completing this mission. This way, eliminations don't affect your ratings while you focus on mastering SMGs.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 500 Enemies with SMGs
requirements.description: Eliminate 500 enemies using SMG weapons like UMP45, Vector, or Tommy Gun.

requirements.heading: Play in Classic or Unranked Mode
requirements.description: Complete this mission in Classic or Unranked mode to count towards the progress of eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose the Right SMG for Your Playstyle
tipsTricks.description: Pick your SMG based on your preferences. The UMP45 is great for consistent damage, while the Vector offers a higher rate of fire for quick eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: SMGs Shine in Close-Range Combat
tipsTricks.description: SMGs are designed for close-range fights. Use them when engaging enemies in buildings, warehouses, or tight spaces where rapid fire is crucial.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for the Head for Quick Kills
tipsTricks.description: SMGs fire rapidly, making it easier to hit the head. Aim for headshots to reduce the number of shots needed to eliminate enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Unranked Mode to Protect Your Rating
tipsTricks.description: Play in Unranked Mode to focus on eliminations with SMGs without affecting your ranking or rating. This mode allows you to improve your skills while protecting your stats.
